rule.name: AS_IO_BL_constructDocumentReviewTask
rule.description: This rule is to construct document review task
rule.definition:
a!localVariables( local!onboardingRequest: #"_a-0000e6e2-62e5-8000-9bfe-011c48011c48_2501604"( castToCdtType: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:IO}AS_IO_OnboardingRequest', returnType: #"_a-0000e415-3035-8000-9bb2-011c48011c48_290157", requestId: ri!requestId ), local!dueDateCalculationUnit: #"_a-0000e2ad-62e7-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_73980"( nullableValue: local!onboardingRequest.slaDayType, replacementValue: #"_a-0000e460-9d93-8000-9bc1-011c48011c48_620378" ), local!dueDate: if( local!dueDateCalculationUnit = #"_a-0000e460-9d93-8000-9bc1-011c48011c48_620378", workday( today(), #"_a-0000e79b-0335-8000-9c0c-011c48011c48_3040799" ), /*default is calendar days*/ today() + #"_a-0000e79b-0335-8000-9c0c-011c48011c48_3040799" ), if( #"_a-0000e2ad-62e7-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_73536"(ri!documentUploadTasks), {}, cast( 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:IO}AS_IO_Task?list', #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"( items: ri!documentUploadTasks, expression: { request: local!onboardingRequest, taskRefId: #"_a-0000e7fa-f829-8000-9c17-011c48011c48_3480086", taskName: #"_a-0000e2cd-bc96-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_81818"( i18nData: ri!i18nData, bundleKey: "AS.CO.AllBundles.lbl_ReviewDocument", arguments: #"_a-0000e2cd-bc96-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_81818"( i18nData: ri!i18nData, bundleKey: fv!item.requiredDocument.requirementName ) ), taskBehaviorType: #"_a-0000e393-fbf1-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_108080"( behaviorSubtypeCode: #"_a-0000e79b-0335-8000-9c0c-011c48011c48_3040883", configurationLevelCode: #"_a-0000e393-fbf1-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_99892" ), taskCategory: #"_a-0000e393-fbf1-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_100474"( returnType: #"_a-0000e415-3035-8000-9bb2-011c48011c48_290157", taskCategoryId: #"_a-0000e7d2-6286-8000-9c11-011c48011c48_3119705",
), groupAssignee: if( ri!isUploadLater, null, #"_a-0000e438-fd8a-8000-9bbe-011c48011c48_411694" ), taskStatus: #"_a-0000e79b-0335-8000-9c0c-011c48011c48_3006672"( returnType: #"_a-0000e415-3035-8000-9bb2-011c48011c48_290157", taskStatusIds: if( #"_a-0000e2ad-62e7-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_73536"(ri!taskStatusId), #"_a-0000e460-9d93-8000-9bc1-011c48011c48_603230", ri!taskStatusId ) ), requiredDocument: fv!item.requiredDocument, taskPrecedents: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:IO}AS_IO_Task_Precedent'(taskId_precedent: fv!item.taskId), dueDate: local!dueDate, slaDays: #"_a-0000e79b-0335-8000-9c0c-011c48011c48_3040799", slaRule: #"_a-0000e460-9d93-8000-9bc1-011c48011c48_620337", createdBy: #"_a-0000e2ad-62e7-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_73366", createdDatetime: now(), modifiedBy: #"_a-0000e2ad-62e7-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_73366", modifiedDatetime: now() } ) ) ) )
